results.abstract: $30,000 in valuables, including mementoes from his career as astronaut, are stolen from Potomac, Md, home of Sen John Glenn (S)
results.snippet: POTOMAC, Md., Feb. 28 (AP) Cherished medals and mementoes from Senator John Glenn's career as an astronaut were among items stolen from his home here Saturday, the Montgomery County police reported today.
results.lead_paragraph: POTOMAC, Md., Feb. 28 (AP) Cherished medals and mementoes from Senator John Glenn's career as an astronaut were among items stolen from his home here Saturday, the Montgomery County police reported today.

headline.main: If Belief Is Eroding, So May Churches' Role in the Larger Society; Religion: Where Have All The Believers Gone?

results.snippet: A recent survey of Catholic life in the Yorkville section of New York City's Upper East Side traced declines in Catholic worship to a loss of faith in the church's central mysteries, and thus confronted Catholicism with the possibility that belief...
results.lead_paragraph: A recent survey of Catholic life in the Yorkville section of New York City's Upper East Side traced declines in Catholic worship to a loss of faith in the church's central mysteries, and thus confronted Catholicism with the possibility that belief may be eroding among a sizable segment of American Catholics.

headline.main: Alvin Austin, 83, Former Chairman Of U.S. Father's Day Committee

results.snippet: Alvin Austin, former chairman of the National Father's Day Committee, died Friday at his home in Palm Beach. He was 83 years old.
results.lead_paragraph: Alvin Austin, former chairman of the National Father's Day Committee, died Friday at his home in Palm Beach. He was 83 years old.

results.abstract: Charles A Lindbergh Memorial Fund to issue medal commemg late aviator's historic solo trans-Atlantic flight in '27; medal illus (M)
results.snippet: The medallion pictured here was created to mark the 50th anniversary of Charles Lindbergh's epic solo flight across the Atlantic Ocean which began  on May 20, 1927, in New York and ended 33 hours later in Paris. It shows a bust of Lindbergh with a...
results.lead_paragraph: The medallion pictured here was created to mark the 50th anniversary of Charles Lindbergh's epic solo flight across the Atlantic Ocean which began on May 20, 1927, in New York and ended 33 hours later in Paris. It shows a bust of Lindbergh with a depiction of his plane, "The Spirit of St. Louis," in the background.

results.snippet: KIMBERLEY ANN, 9, has just decided what she wants to be when she grows up: a part-time cocktail waitress with frosted blond streaks. It is probably just a coin  cidence that Kimberley Ann's mother recently graduated from law school and lopped off her...
results.lead_paragraph: KIMBERLEY ANN, 9, has just decided what she wants to be when she grows up: a part-time cocktail waitress with frosted blond streaks. It is probably just a coin cidence that Kimberley Ann's mother recently graduated from law school and lopped off her two-tone gold ringlets right at the dark roots.
